content: Non-White will attempt to ambush you early into your exploration for the entrance to the Valley of Ecstasy after you climb up from the Bitter Lake in The New West. Upon reaching the Mindfullness Cliff, you'll encounter him at the top platform in an outdoor area circling a large pit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-White'.
The content is as follows:
Non-White will attempt to ambush you early into your exploration for the entrance to the Valley of Ecstasy after you climb up from the Bitter Lake in The New West. Upon reaching the Mindfullness Cliff, you'll encounter him at the top platform in an outdoor area circling a large pit.
